TEI:
Kalittokai 54.
itu kaippaṭṭuk kalaṅkiya varuttattaik kaḷaintēṉeṉa uraiyeṉat tōḻikku uraittaṟkaṭ ṭalaivi kūṟiyatu. atu notumalar varaiviṟku maṇamuracu iyampiyavaḻi āṇṭāṉum piṟavāṇṭāṉun tōḻikku iṉṉavāṟu kūṭṭam nikaḻntateṉak kūṟi, ataṉai namar aṟiyak kūṟal-vēṇṭumeṉṟun talaivaṟku nam varuttam aṟiyak kūṟalvēṇṭu-meṉṟun talaivi kūṟutaṟkaṇ nikaḻvatu.
koṭiyavuṅ kōṭṭavu nīriṉṟi niṟampeṟap
poṭiyaḻaṟ puṟantanta pūvāppūm polaṉkōtai
toṭiceṟi yāppamai yarimuṉkai yaṇaittōḷā
yaṭiyuṟai yaruḷāmai yottatō niṉakkeṉṉa
narantanā ṟiruṅkūnta leñcātu naṉipaṟṟip
polampuṉai makaravāy nuṅkiya cikaḻikai
nalampeṟac cuṟṟiya kuralamai yorukāḻ
viraṉmuṟai cuṟṟi mōkkalu mōntaṉa
ṉaṟāavaviḻn taṉṉaveṉ melviraṟ pōtukoṇṭu
ceṟāac ceṅkaṇ putaiya vaittup
paṟāak kuruki ṉuyirttalu muyirttaṉaṉ
ṟoyyi liḷamulai yiṉiya taivantu
toyyalan taṭakkaiyiṉ vīḻpiṭi yaḷikku
maiyal yāṉaiyiṉ maruṭṭalu maruṭṭiṉaṉ;
ataṉāl,
allal kaḷaintaṉaṉ tōḻi nannaka
raruṅkaṭi nīvāmai kūṟi ṉaṉṟeṉa
niṉṉoṭu cūḻval tōḻi nayampurin
tiṉṉatu ceytā ḷivaḷeṉa
maṉṉā vulakattu maṉṉuvatu puraimē.
